mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_order (sales_order_num, customer_num, order_date, total_price, emp_num) VALUES (#{sales_order_num}, #{customer_num}, sysdate, #{total_price}, #{emp_num})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sales_order ORDER BY sales_order_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_order_detail (sales_order_num, product_num, quantity, unit_price) VALUES (#{sales_order_num}, #{product_num}, #{quantity}, #{unit_price})
